languages.text: "К счастью, их все меньше. Слыхали о семействе Карити?"

traits.locale_text: "К счастью, их все меньше. Слыхали о семействе Карити?"

languages.text: "We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"
languages.original_text: "К счастью, их все меньше. Слыхали о семействе Карити?"

traits.locale_text: "Fortunately, they lose their numbers. Ever heard of the Cariti family?
"Fortunately, they lose their numbers. Ever heard of the Cariti family?
"Fortunately, they are losing numbers. Ever heard of the Cariti family?
"Fortunately, they are losing numbers. Ever heard of the Cariti family?
"We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"

languages.text: “他们的人越来越少，真是件好事。你肯定听说过卡里蒂家族发生的事情了吧？”
languages.original_text: "We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"

traits.locale_text: “他们的人越来越少，真是件好事。你肯定听说过卡里蒂家族发生的事情了吧？”

languages.text: « Nous pouvons nous estimer heureux que leurs nombres s'amenuisent de jour en jour. Je présume que vous êtes au courant, pour la famille Cariti ? »
languages.original_text: "We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous pouvons nous estimer heureux que leurs nombres s'amenuisent de jour en jour. Je présume que vous êtes au courant, pour la famille Cariti ? »

languages.text: 「彼らの数が日に日に減っていることに感謝しましょう。カリティ家のニュースはお聞きになりましたか？」
languages.original_text: "We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの数が日に日に減っていることに感謝しましょう。カリティ家のニュースはお聞きになりましたか？」

languages.text: «Podemos dar gracias a que cada vez quedan menos. ¿Has oído lo de la familia Cariti?».
languages.original_text: "We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"

traits.locale_text: «Podemos dar gracias a que cada vez quedan menos. ¿Has oído lo de la familia Cariti?».

languages.text: "Wir können dankbar sein, dass ihre Zahl von Tag zu Tag schrumpft. Ihr habt gewiss schon von der Familie Cariti gehört, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir können dankbar sein, dass ihre Zahl von Tag zu Tag schrumpft. Ihr habt gewiss schon von der Familie Cariti gehört, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: "Çok şükür ki sayıları her geçen gün azalıyor. Cariti ailesine olanları duymuşsunuzdur..."
languages.original_text: "We can be thankful that their numbers are dwindling by the day. I am sure you heard the news about the Cariti family?"
